</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets person's facial expression. To set it back to default, use "".
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature arma3</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Prior to Arma 3 v2.01.146630 Mimics must be written in all lower case letters.</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> person [[setMimic]] mimic </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> person: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> mimic: [[String]] - can be one of:
{<template><title>!</title></template>

* "Hurt"

* "Sad"
* "Cynic"
* "Surprised"

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> style="vertical-align: top" <template><title>!</title></template>

* "aware"

* "combat"

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>} </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
